Module gmit.software
Package ie.gmit.sw

Class SpriteTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.Tile
      • ie.gmit.sw.SpriteTile

  • public class SpriteTile
extends Tile
    This class set the direction of the object on start of the program. It change the image used depending on what direction the the sprite is moved
    Author:
    Ray
